reviewText: I rated this product at two stars because it was suppose to come with a trading card and it did not. My son was extremely disappointed.
My son has watched this program wherever he could find it since he was two years old. This is a good buy for a little boy.
I purchased this and another Dinosaur King for my son.  He loves the show, so for us it was a great buy.
This was actually for our grandsons, & they just love it!  Anything to do with dinosaurs, & it's great!
My daughter hasn't stopped watching the DVD since she got them. Came in good condition and in a timely manner.
son super excited but skips in beginning

My kid loves dinosaurs and this show has the right mix dino action that my son goes crazy over. I've been told that this is the "pokemon" of dinosaurs. I wish there were more episodes on this dvd, only 4 or 5 on this disc. But its great for keeping my son entertained.

My 4 yr old grandson loves the dinosaur king he watches it on netflix and now he can watch it on his dvd player when we are on the road and do not have wifi hookup.  It makes things easier on the adults in the car and keeps him busy.  So it is a winner all around.
This was a fun show to watch while it was on. I give it a 5 out of 5
I like the first season of Dinosaur King and the first three shows.  What I like to know is do you have a dvd with the episode called Battle Royal? It was my favorite. Please reply.  Thank you.

As for the DVD my son loves it... I wish I could stream it free on Prime. We received it in Amazon's promised time (I love Amazon) and there was no card in the case...I contact customer service and they very quickly sent a replacement that also did not include a card ...I read the packaging hoping there was a code to send in or an address to claim the card and there is not one...

Son loves the show and you get five shows,which lasts for a while. Only disappointing thing (which I've seen on here a few times) is I didn't get the card it promises. That part should be removed from the description
When I got I didn't get the card but I still like the movie though. So that's what I have to say.
